item.title: Report E-2024080435
item.description:
Report E-2024080435

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-20T18:16:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-15
  • City: CHASKA
  • State: MN
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: VEOLIA ES TECHNICAL SOLUTIONS, L.L.C.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: During a customer site pickup, an incident occurred involving a drum of Isopropanol. A Veolia employee was reorganizing the box truck when the accident happened. While using a drum cart to relocate the Isopropanol container, the drum was improperly secured and fell backwards onto the cart. As a result, one of the cart's forks punctured the drum. The puncture caused approximately 2 gallons of Isopropanol to spill. Prompt action was taken to address the situation. The spilled material was thoroughly cleaned up and disposed of in accordance with proper procedures. To prevent further leakage, the damaged drum was placed inside an overpack container.
